page.title: 18ECOLOGY IN SANDBACH
page.content: {ECOLOGY}IN SANDBACH HAS BEEN CHANGED BY THE NEW ROAD.{NATURE}HAS BEEN UPSET BY THE NEW ROAD WHICH HAS GONE THROUGH {FARM-LAND}AND NATURE AREAS,ALSO IT HAS UPSET THE WILDLIFE IN THE AREA. IN THE NATURE AREAS SUCH AS WOODS AND FARM-LAND MANY FOOTPATHS HAVE BEEN MADE.THE WEATHER IS UNPREDICTABLE,IT NEVER KNOWS WHAT IT IS GOING TO DO NEXT. IN SANDBACH THERE IS NOT A LOT OF {POLLUTION}AS AROUND US THERE ISN'T ANY FACTORIES,BUT THERE IS POLLUTION IN WATER AS PEOPLE EMPTY PETROL INTO THE WATER. MANY ANIMALS ARE RUN OVER BY CARELESS DRIVERS. IN DINGLE LAKE SOME FISH DIE BECAUSE OF THE LEAD IN THE WEIGHTS ALSO THE GEESE AND THE SWANS DIE OF THE SAME CAUSE. RECENTLY THE AREA AROUND THE SAND QUARRY HAS BEEN LAND-SCAPED AND IS MUCH MORE PLEASING TO THE EYE.
